'''Colombo Arditi''' (born in [[1940]]) was a member of the [[Notion Club]].

== History ==
Colombo Arditi was educated at St. John's and was a professor of [[wikipedia:Italian language|Italian]]. He was fond of singing basso, swimming and the game of bowls; he also collected books and [[Cats]].<ref>{{SD|2b}}</ref>
